messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I would like to change the wireless earbuds in my order W5061109 to a blue colored one. Please make sure the price is the same or lower than the original. If you have several options, I prefer the one without water resistance. Could you please help me with this as soon as possible?

If you have several options, I prefer the one without water resistance. Could you please help me with this as soon as possible?
